PlantForm: Small to medium size deciduous tree.
Size: Up to 10 m tall, usually 2-5 m.
Leaves: Bright green and greyish underneath, alternate on branches, consist of 9-15 lance or egg shaped leaflets with single leaflet at end of branch. Change to red in winter.
Flowers: Creamy white to yellowish green, clustered into flowering heads.
FruitSeeds: Pale brown, round to egg shaped to 1 cm diameter with hard central stone.
DistinguishingFeatures: Distinguished from similar trees mainly by the single end leaflet and leaves going red in winter.
